item.title: Remove `curl` alias from PowerShell permanently
item.description: PowerShell aliases curl to Invoke-WebRequest by default. To use the actual curl binary, remove this alias permanently. Check if profile exists Test-Path $PROFILE If False, create it: New-Item -Path $PROFILE -ItemType File -Force Add alias removal to profile notepad $profile Add this line and save: Remove-Item Alias:curl -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Restart PowerShell. If alias persists Enable script execution: Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser
